ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: The scale master only drops red scales.  While there are rumors on some sites (Warrior Site I believe) that he has dropped white or green scales - it has never
ygData.messageBody:
The scale master only drops red scales. While there are rumors on some
sites (Warrior Site I believe) that he has dropped white or green scales -
it has never been confirmed. There are detailed discussions of this on The
Concert Hall's Epic Forum at http://pub5.ezboard.com/ftheconcerthallfrm7

My guild isn't Gor capable yet - so I'm planning on leading a Vox Raid with
that scale defaulting to me. I had a long discussion with my guild as to
whether this is considered acceptable (since I can't actually fight Vox) -
and it was agreed that it was acceptable for the scale to default to me if I
lead the raid.

Slyde
very close to dinging 55 finally

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 2:30 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?




How are people getting the white scales on your server? Is anyone killing
the scale master? On my server Vox and Nagafen are killed within hours of
poping. The white scale is defently the HUGE bottle neck on my server. How
about yours?

Mu

Yup, I am on all the lists I can find. 5 more months at sea then I can play
eq again.

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 8:57 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ding 60!


Gronk! Another person from the cleric list too!!!


>
